about_the_game:
( DLC opens from launch option "DLC launcher" )

--- technical info ---

- game resolution is 640x480
- not so well done graphics
- you can watch over to left and right with A and D keys
- you can move forward and backwards with W and S keys
- most of the time you can continue after messages with C
- in one mission you can hit the key for that is LEFT CLICK
- in one mission you change your weapon key for that is E
- you can exit the game with ESC

--- story ---
world is corrupting and there is nothing to do about it currently
in finland currently where player is located there the corruption
starts first player need to survive long as possible and if
player survives the corruption the next day may be seen

--- WARNINGS ABOUT THE DLC ---

- the dlc contains suicide scenes
- the dlc contains aggresive actions

--- WARNINGS ABOUT THE DLC ---

name: finland corruption simulator - world corruption

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Core i5-3450
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 730 2GB DDR3
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
